iTunes users - Add this to your iTunes collection, and change "Media Kind" to "Audiobook." Right-click the track or album, and select "Get Info" from the context menu. You will find "Media Kind" under "Options." This will allow you to transfer the book to your iOS device while keeping it separate from your music collection. This will also keep your track position when listening in iTunes.


All the Presidents' Bankers: The Hidden Alliances That Drive American Power

Written by: Nomi Prins
Narrated by: Marguerite Gavin
Length: 19 hrs and 55 mins
Format: Unabridged
Release Date:06-11-14
Program Type: Audiobook

Culled from original presidential archival documents, All the Presidents' Bankers delivers an explosive account of the 100-year interdependence between the White House and Wall Street that transcends a simple analysis of money driving politics or greed driving bankers.

Nomi Prins ushers us into the intimate world of exclusive clubs, vacation spots, and Ivy League universities that binds presidents and financiers. She unravels the multi-generational blood, intermarriage, and protÃƒÂ©gÃƒÂ© relationships that have confined national influence to a privileged cluster of people. This unprecedented history of American power illuminates how financiers have retained their authoritative position through history, swaying presidents regardless of party affiliation. It explores the alarming global repercussions of a system lacking barriers between public office and private power. Prins leaves us with an ominous choice: either we break the alliances of the power elite, or they will break us.
